name: places/ChIJu3EagKdZwokRpkWbgGp-HT0
formattedAddress: 125 E 27th St, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 125 E 27th St, New York, NY 10016, USA

editorialSummary.text: Trendy rooftop bar offering a covered bar & skyline views, plus cocktails & international bites.

originalText.text: Nice rooftop terrace with good views of iconic buildings. The cocktails were just ok (had the white negroni sbagliato) but the food was good. We got the fried chicken sando which was very good, especially the bun, the eggplant and mozz fries and chicken wings which were delicious!

text.text: Nice rooftop terrace with good views of iconic buildings. The cocktails were just ok (had the white negroni sbagliato) but the food was good. We got the fried chicken sando which was very good, especially the bun, the eggplant and mozz fries and chicken wings which were delicious!

authorAttribution.displayName: Lisa Steele l Fresh Eggs Daily

originalText.text:
Hidden gem on the roof of the Park South Hotel. So pretty! The staff was fun and friendly and the frozen cocktails are out of this world.  Also there's beer and wine available.  There's a light munchies menu also. We had nachos and guacamole, chicken  bites and shrimp tacos and they all were the perfect accompaniment to the beverages.  Although you'll pay $19/drink, its worth I can't wait to go back.

6/2023 I've been back a few times and the menu just keeps getting better, as does the cocktail offering. Super fun staff.  Friendly and  knowledgeable.  The tuna tartar and sushi to stay was amazing, as were the eggplant and mozzarella sticks and sliders. Highy recommend checking out the roof at Park South.

originalText.text: It was a nice bar, closes a little earlier than most other bars I've been to in the area. Personal highlight was a naked man painting his apartment opposite the bar.

text.text: It was a nice bar, closes a little earlier than most other bars I've been to in the area. Personal highlight was a naked man painting his apartment opposite the bar.

originalText.text:
If you're looking for a great rooftop bar with delicious drinks and tasty food, the Rooftop at Park South Hotel is the perfect spot. The first thing you'll notice is the stunning view of the city skyline, which is only enhanced by the chic and sophisticated atmosphere of the bar itself.

One of the standout features of the Rooftop is the frozen cocktails, which are perfect for sipping on a hot summer day. The Smoke Melons with mezcal and passion fruit daiquiri are both must-tries. And if you're looking for something to nibble on while you enjoy your drink, the shrimp cocktail with its amazing sauces combination is a real winner.

But the real surprise comes from the spicy salmon roll, served with fried potato and serrano chilies, which is provided by the Rooftop's sister restaurant, GG Tokyo. It's a fusion of flavors that will leave your taste buds singing.

The service at the Rooftop is also something to be admired. The staff is incredibly friendly and attentive, making sure you have everything you need to fully enjoy your experience. And to top it all off, the casual music adds to the laid-back vibe of the bar.

originalText.text: Gorgeous roof with great service. I was hired by a company to offer henna there!
